author: gkaratha
body:
Dear all,

Please review this PR. Is a backport of  #25984 as was requested. Nothing is different in terms of code ( with the small exception that ConversionTools interface is different in 10_2X than 10_5X, so i adjusted it). The rate has been measured and is 5.35% as in the  #25984. Thanks

Best regards,
George
title: Skim backport in102 x
